ISSUE.TITLE: No Headers/Auth section
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Please enter the following details** Copy and paste project info : [Youtube Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AUSNN-RCwhE) or please provide the following details : NocoDB used as docker : true NocoDB version : master Database used in NC_DB URL: sqlite3 Project was created by clicking : New Project Database on which spreadsheet is created : sqlite3 OS on which NocoDB is running : ubuntu trusty on docker for mac big sure Node.js version if running as node : Database version : **Steps To Reproduce** 1. Go to Automations on a given table 2. Notifications and set to URL 3. Set a URL 4. set some parameters 5. click on Headers / Auth **Expected behaviour** UI to edit the headers or authentication should appear **Screenshots** **ERROR ** ```js TypeError: can't convert undefined to object NuxtJS 79 headerListAutoWithEnv get evaluate In fn je fn r genWrapper render _render r get En mount $mount init v v _ v Co _update r get En mount $mount init v v _ v Co _update r get run Sn le se promise callback*re le update update notify set set updateItem updateItemsState le se promise callback*re le $nextTick updateItemsState run Sn le se promise callback*re le update update notify set set set updateSingle updateInternalValue onClick register te $emit toggle click te n _wrapper 021e3d9.js:2:12066 NuxtJS 72 ``` Join our discord : https://discord.gg/5RgZmkW for realtime help. Node version : **v12.22.1** Arch type: **x64** Platform: **linux** Docker: **true** Database: **sqlite3** packageVersion: **0.9.27**
